snippet: Bucks readers offer advice on how business people should handle their financial lives.
abstract: Bucks readers offer advice on how business people should handle their financial lives.
lead_paragraph: The discussion of taxes usually waits until sometime close to the filing deadline, April 15. But this year, the presidential candidates' release of their past returns has lead to a much deeper look much earlier.

headline.main: Financial Advice for More Than Just Political Hopefuls
